Presentation.description: Hello! My name is Kéven Goulart and I work as a developer specializing in TypeScript, Node, React, NextJS and NestJS. I have experience in building full-stack applications, working on both front-end and back-end development, with a focus on scalable and well-structured solutions, and i have advanced proficiency in English.

Projects.title: Personal Projects
Projects.description: It may take some time for the online projects to load, as they are hosted on free-tier services.
Projects.geeklogDescription: A social platform I developed for reviewing and sharing different types of media — such as movies, tv shows, books, games and others — with friends
Projects.geeklogTech: Technologies used: NextJS, NestJS, TailwindCSS, Typescript, MongoDB, Prisma, Redis, Docker, etc.
Projects.pokeGuesserDescription: Small game to guess the names of Pokémons
Projects.pokeGuesserTech: Technologies used: NestJS, TailwindCSS, Typescript, Prisma, Docker, Postgres, NestJS
Projects.typeBattleDescription: Online game to compete in real time with another person to see who types the displayed words the fastest — the first to complete all 10 words wins.
Projects.typeBattleTech: Technologies used: NextJS, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, WebSocket.
Projects.whatsGoodDescription: A web application that shows the highest rated movies and TV shows of some of the most popular streaming services.
Projects.whatsGoodTech: Technologies used: NextJS, NestJS, TailwindCSS, TypeScript.
Projects.otherProjectsDescription: You can check out my other projects on my GitHub profile.

ProfessionalProjects.title: Professional Projects
ProfessionalProjects.upslimDescription: Web platform developed to manage user access to a subscription-based service focused on a weight loss method. The system provides secure authentication, subscription management, exclusive content, and a smooth experience for returning users.
ProfessionalProjects.upslimTech: Technologies used: Next.js, NestJS, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Redis, Docker, etc.
ProfessionalProjects.draVictoriaDescription: Institutional landing page developed to present the doctor, her services, and areas of expertise, with a focus on credibility, clear information, and converting visitors into qualified leads.
ProfessionalProjects.draVictoriaTech: Technologies used: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Docker.
ProfessionalProjects.goldCicloDescription: Landing page developed to promote a vitamin supplement, focusing on clear presentation of the product, its differentiators, and composition, prioritizing credibility, usability, and conversion.
ProfessionalProjects.goldCicloTech: Technologies used: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Docker.
ProfessionalProjects.maisVitDescription: Landing page developed for the institutional presentation of a vitamin supplement brand, focusing on strengthening brand positioning.
ProfessionalProjects.maisVitTech: Technologies used: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Docker.
ProfessionalProjects.metibalaDescription: Landing page developed to promote a vitamin supplement, focusing on clear presentation of the product, its differentiators, and composition, prioritizing credibility, usability, and conversion.
ProfessionalProjects.metibalaTech: Technologies used: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Docker.

Modal.warning: The online applications may take some time to fully initialize, as they are hosted on free services.
